holidays.title: National Trail Mix Day
holidays.description: We eat it without thinking about it but trail mix keeps us happy throughout the day.

holidays.title: Birth Anniversary of President Ramon Magsaysay
holidays.description: The Birth Anniversary of President Ramon Magsaysay celebrates a champion of the Filipino masses.

holidays.title: Eat Outside Day
holidays.description: We’ve got some suggestions to make you salivate over Eat Outside Day.

holidays.title: Independence Day
holidays.description: This Merdeka Day, Malaysians celebrate their love for their country with great patriotic spirit.

holidays.title: International Cabernet Day
holidays.description: Get your wine glasses ready for some Cabernet this International Cabernet Day!

holidays.title: International Day for People of African Descent
holidays.description: Pay homage to African communities everywhere on the first observance of this international day.

holidays.title: International Overdose Awareness Day
holidays.description: Let’s put up a fight against the issues preventing solutions this International Overdose Awareness Day.

holidays.title: Kyrgyzstan Independence Day
holidays.description: Want to learn more about Kyrgyzstan? Join us as we uncover this beautiful country.

holidays.title: La Tomatina
holidays.description: Get your tomatoes ready as we prepare to celebrate this day with the ultimate tomato fight!

holidays.title: Love Litigating Lawyers Day
holidays.description: Here are some fun ways to celebrate those in the legal profession.

holidays.title: National Dan Day
holidays.description: Daniel (Dan) was the 14th most popular name in the U.S. in 2021.

holidays.title: National Diatomaceous Earth Day
holidays.description: Diatomaceous earth is a product used even in toothpaste! Learn more here.

holidays.title: National Matchmaker Day
holidays.description: This day raises a toast to the people who create happy endings for others.

holidays.title: National South Carolina Day
holidays.description: Get ready to experience South Carolina hospitality like never before! Read on for more!

holidays.title: National Zoo Awareness Day
holidays.description: How well do you know your zoos? Read on and find out.

holidays.title: Trinidad and Tobago Independence Day
holidays.description: Join us as we look at the cultural and ecological diversity of Trinidad and Tobago.

holidays.title: We Love Memoirs Day
holidays.description: Study the lives of others and learn some insights on We Love Memoirs Day!

holidays.title: World Distance Learning Day
holidays.description: A day to embrace the learning that takes place outside of the physical classroom.

holidays.title: Debbie Gibson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented pop star, singer-songwriter, and pianist has returned to music with a passion!

holidays.title: Dreka Gates’s Birthday
holidays.description: The accomplished model and mother of two juggles stardom and raising a family like a pro.

holidays.title: Joe Budden’s Birthday
holidays.description: He has established himself as one of the most talented and in-demand rappers in the industry.

holidays.title: Maria Montessori’s Birthday
holidays.description: We could all learn a thing or two from this incredible lady.

holidays.title: Richard Gere’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented actor, film producer, pianist, musician, and composer has achieved everything there is to achieve.

holidays.title: Van Morrison’s Birthday
holidays.description: Not only is he a multi-talented artist, but he is also a decorated knight.
